message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?

Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $20,000 reflects the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits you'll gain.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
